attributes.additional_details:
Everton football club have had their fair share of ups and downs.  This month we have found out that Everton registered a new badge at the IPO.  We must stand together, for the love of the club, for the love of the heritage, and DEMAND that Everton step back from their plans for a new branding.

If you haven't seen the badge yet, it is here:http://www.ipo.gov.uk/tmcase/Results/1/UK00002656323
